response.overview: While doing a series of reports on alternative energy sources, opportunistic reporter Kimberly Wells witnesses an accident at a nuclear power plant. Wells is determined to publicize the incident, but soon finds herself entangled in a sinister conspiracy to keep the full impact of the incident a secret.
response.tagline: People who know the meaning of "The China Syndrome" are scared... Soon you will know.
response.title: The China Syndrome

results.name: ABC The China Syndrome 1983 Sunday Night Movie bumper
